name: Time Defense!
description:
Xanderjam 5 Entry

This was an experiment to use Construct 3's new 3D features combined with kindeyegame's / Mikal's 3D Object plugin to use more complex models in the engine.  The art and sound were all from packs for the most part as just learning how to work in 3D and the pipeline of converting everything in blender was work enough :)

Note: the first time you load the game, the intro scene may take a moment to load all the models / get going.

Tie to the theme: I had a lot of fun using the timescale element on various objects as they were "frozen" such as the soldiers.

Enjoy!

I will eventually make a YouTube video on the 3D plugin and some tricks, give my channel a look if interested!

https://www.youtube.com/c/FoozleCC

3D Object Plugin: https://kindeyegames.itch.io/c3-3dobject-alpha

Credits:

Special thanks to Mikal / kindeyegames for his work on the plugin and the almost real time updates to making it better.
